text: kāpaṭyaṁ kāṇiccavare nī kaṇṭillē? vēdakkārile satyaniṣēdhikaḷāya sahēādaraṅṅaḷēāṭ avar paṟayunnu: "niṅṅaḷ nāṭukaṭattappeṭukayāṇeṅkil niścayamāyuṁ niṅṅaḷēāṭeāppaṁ ñaṅṅaḷuṁ puṟattupēāruṁ. niṅṅaḷuṭe kāryattil ñaṅṅaḷ orikkaluṁ maṟṟāreyuṁ anusarikkukayilla. niṅṅaḷkketire yud'dhamuṇṭāyāl uṟappāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷe sahāyikkuṁ.” ennāl ī kapaṭanmār kaḷḷaṁ paṟayunnavarāṇenn allāhu sākṣyaṁ vahikkunnu
